patthana8.62:1.1_0: Nasavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.62:2.1_0: Naavicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.62:3.1_0: Nasavicārañca naavicārañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.62:4.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
